title: [李卓仁作證]  美國參議院聽證會美國時間6月4日上午11點

replies.msg:
Crisis in Hong Kong: A Review of U.S. Policy Tools
DATE: Thursday, June 4, 2020
TIME: 11:00 AM
LOCATION: Remote

https://www.banking.senate.gov/hearings/crisis-in-hong-kong-a-review-of-us-policy-tools

TOPIC
THE COMMITTEE ON BANKING, HOUSING, AND URBAN AFFAIRS will meet REMOTELY to conduct a hearing entitled “Crisis in Hong Kong: A Review of U.S. Policy Tools.” The witnesses will be: Mr. Eric Lorber, Senior Director, Center on Economic and Financial Power (CEFP) Foundation for Defense of Democracies; Mr. Peter Harrell, Adjunct Senior Fellow, Center for a New American Security; and Dr. Michael F. Martin, Specialist in Asian Affairs, Asia Section, Foreign Affairs, Defense and Trade Division, Congressional Research Service; and Mr. Lee Cheuk Yan, General Secretary of the Hong Kong Confederation of Trade Unions, the Vice Chairman of the Hong Kong Labour Party.
李卓仁
大家一定要睇實佢講咩，佢一講咗啲柒嘢唔該大家請喺Twitter同美國啲議員澄清返香港人嘅民意
